title: Business Card, "One Thing You Should Never Forget, Mary Anne Kraus Gymnastics and Massage"
medium: Offset lithograph and letterpress on heavy grey coated wove paper, mounted on grey-blue wove paper

tombstone.epitaph:
Business Card, "One Thing You Should Never Forget, Mary Anne Kraus Gymnastics and Massage".
Offset lithograph and letterpress on heavy grey coated wove paper, mounted on grey-blue wove paper. Gift of James Howard Fraser. 2000-68-112.
